metadata.description: Globally unique name for the Kusto cluster. Lowercase letters and numbers. Start with letter. 4-22 characters.
Name for the azmeta database in your Kusto cluster.
Globally unique name for the storage account. Lowercase letters and numbers. 3-24 characters.
Globally unique name for the data factory. Alphanumerics and hyphens. Start and end with alphanumeric. 3-63 characters.
Deploy for pre-production use. Uses development SKU for Azure Data Explorer.
Set to true if redeploying the template. Data Factory trigger resources can not be redeployed while they are enabled.
The client/app id (not object id) for the service principal that data factory will use to connect to Kusto.
The client secret for the service principal that data factory will use to connect to Kusto.
The resource id of the user-assigned managed identity resource to use during deployment.

command.value:
@concat('.drop extents <| 
  .show table UsagePreliminary extents 
  | extend Tags = split(Tags, "\r\n")
  | where set_has_element(Tags, "', last(split(pipeline().parameters.BlobPath, '/')),'")')

@concat('.drop extents <| 
  .show table UsagePreliminary extents 
  | extend Tags = split(Tags, "\r\n")
  | where set_has_element(Tags, "', last(split(pipeline().parameters.BlobPath, '/')),'") and not(set_has_element(Tags, "drop-by:', pipeline().RunId,'"))')
